remarks: A measurable function as a function with domain and codomain (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
statement:
mbfmf.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) $.
mbfmf.2 $e |- ( ph -> T e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) $.
mbfmf.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( S MblFnM T ) ) $.
mbfmf $p |- ( ph -> F : U. S --> U. T ) $.
